title: Driving Towards Impact: The Emergence of Financial Capability
summary: This new brief chronicles the collaboration between the Center for Financial Services Innovation and the Citi Foundation to create systems change in the financial capability arena through its investments in the Financial Capability Innovation Fund and the Financial Capability Institute. The brief describes how the financial capability approach improves consumers' financial health by employing strategies that connect relevant and timely information and guidance with access to financial products and tools that empower consumers to act on what they learn.
tag-1: Driving Towards Impact: The Emergence of Financial Capability
